title: Render uploaded QR code image on the Slides page

requirements.summary: Add the uploaded QR code image to public static assets and render it responsively on the existing /slides route with English alt text.
acceptanceCriteria: The repository contains the uploaded file "Morris, 2012, QR code.png" under a public static assets directory so it is served by the frontend.
Visiting the Slides tab route (/slides) displays the image.
The image is responsive (fits within the page width without overflowing) and includes an English alt text.
The Slides tab no longer renders a blank page (SlidesPage.tsx no longer returns null).

file_operations.description: Add the provided uploaded image file to the app's publicly served static assets so it can be referenced from the Slides page.

Implement the Slides page UI so it no longer returns null; render the static asset image from frontend/public/assets/Morris, 2012, QR code.png using an English alt text and responsive sizing (e.g., constrain to container width and prevent overflow). Use the existing PageSection layout wrapper for consistent spacing (Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing).
